title: A Disastrous day
creator_contributor_role: Australia. Department of the Attorney-General, partner

abstract: 'I was sitting in my loungeroom, having a morning milo drink when mum said, in a really scared voice, "Get down, get down".'
description: It was a typical morning in Lennox Head for Abby Dietrich and her mother, when things changed dramatically. A tornado and intense storm were followed by calls from friends and family, and the community checking up on each other, helping out and cleaning up.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002419; Living with disaster 2 : Digital Storytelling project; Active; 2010
